name: innoweb/silverstripe-social-metadata
description: Adds social metadata like OpenGraph, Twitter and JSON-LD to all pages.

suggest.innoweb/silverstripe-social-share: Adds sharing links and buttons for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and Google+ as well as AddThis to the site.
suggest.innoweb/silverstripe-social-profiles: Adds social profile links to the site.
